item.title: WanneShop
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Why don’t you use the search button or google, there is enough around on this subject

And search for case 155 ull see this:

case 155:
			/* NPC first click */
			c.NPCSlot = c.inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
			if ((c.NPCSlot < 0) || (c.NPCSlot >= NPCHandler.npcs.length) || (NPCHandler.npcs[c.NPCSlot] == null))
				break;
			c.NPCID = NPCHandler.npcs[c.NPCSlot].npcType;
			server.Pickpocketing.thiefNpcs(c, c.NPCID);
				boolean FishingGo = false;
				boolean PutNPCCoords = false;
				if (Misc.random(100) == 1) {
					c.triggerRandom();
				break;
			}
			if (!c.antiHax())
				break;

(you will not have c. - don’t mind that)

Paste it after that,
note: your first line must be “if” instead of “else if”

like this:

if (NPCID == 650){ // Warrior
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 1; // Melee Shop
}
else if (NPCID == 650){ // Archer
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 2; // Ranged Shop
}

Read full topic

if (NPCID == 650) { // Warrior
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 1; // Melee Shop
} else if (NPCID == 649) { // Archer
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 2; // Ranged Shop
because atm there is no shop in it (its blank) can someone tell me where to put shop in a blank delta and tell me if my code wanneshop is ok, and i need to know where to change varrock tele coord,ardougne, and lumbridge but i can’t find the right coords… thankz =D
